stanza.line: Not mine own fears nor the prophetic soulsoul
Of the wide world dreaming on things to comecome
Can yet the lease of my true love controlcontrol
Supposed as forfeit to a confined doomdoom
The mortal moon hath her eclipse enduredendured
And the sad augurs mock their own presagepresage
And peace proclaims olives of endless ageage
Now with the drops of this most balmy timetime
My love looks fresh and death to me subscribessubscribes
Since spite of him Ill live in this poor rhymerhyme
While he insults oer dull and speechless tribestribes
And thou in this shalt find thy monumentmonument
When tyrants crests and tombs of brass are spentspent
